Function Documentation

void flusspferd::gc ( bool  maybe = false  )  [inline]

Run the garbage collector on the current context.

Parameters:
maybe Whether the engine may, at its discretion, choose whether to actually garbage collect. Default: false, i.e., always collect.
See also:
current_context, context::gc

Contact us at team -AT- flusspferd -DOT- org or as described on our homepage.
